attributes.action: allow part time workers to earn benefits, (i.e.) carers allowance regardless of their income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: persons who work under 30 hours a week cannot claim working tax credits and persons who earn over £95 a week cannot claim carers allowance although those persons are in the most need of help from the govenment, also weather a person is a student or not, if they are a carer to a sick relative or friend they should be entitled to claim without their student finance being affected
